overview:
Jed Alpert joined WebCollage in March of 2006 and is Vice President of Marketing.

Prior to WebCollage, Jed was Assistant Director of Marketing at CT Corporation, a division of Wolters Kluwer.

Jed has also served as Director of Product Marketing and Business Development for InterWorld, a business-to-business and business-to-consumer, ecommerce software company. At InterWorld, Jed developed and launched multiple versions of their flagship product, Commerce Exchange, and worked on strategic relationships.

Jed began his career in consulting with the Washington, D.C.-based Advisory Board Company.

Jed holds a BA from Emory University and an MBA from the University of California at Berkeley.
